TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

summary.span: Esta clase se utiliza cuando se recibe SamlAssertion sin un elemento <ds:KeyInfo> dentro del elemento de firma.

span.span: This class is used when a SamlAssertion is received without a <ds:KeyInfo> element inside the signature element.

summary.span: KeyInfo describe la clave necesaria para comprobar la signatura.

span.span: The KeyInfo describes the key required to check the signature.

summary.span: Cuando se necesita la clave esta cláusula se muestra en la actual.

span.span: When the key is needed this clause will be presented to the current .

summary.span: Contendrá la lectura completa de SamlAssertion que se puede consultar para determinar la clave necesaria.

span.span: It will contain the SamlAssertion fully read which can be queried to determine the key required.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion assertion) cil managed

param.name: assertion

span.span: The assertion that is currently being processed.

param.span: Establece el valor de la propiedad .

span.span: Sets the value of the property.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La aserción se puede consultar para obtener información acerca del emisor al resolver la clave necesaria para comprobar la firma.The assertion can be queried to obtain information about the issuer when resolving the key needed to check the signature. La aserción se leerán completamente cuando esta cláusula se pasa a la objeto.The assertion will be read completely when this clause is passed to the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Assertion As SamlAssertion

summary.span: Obtiene el SamlAssertion actualmente asociado a esta instancia.

span.span: Gets the SamlAssertion that is currently associated with this instance.

value.span: SamlAssertion actualmente asociado a esta instancia.

span.span: The SamlAssertion that is currently associated with this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La aserción se puede consultar para obtener información acerca del emisor al resolver la clave necesaria para comprobar la firma.The assertion can be queried to obtain information about the issuer when resolving the key needed to check the signature. La aserción devuelto puede ser `null`.The assertion returned may be `null`.
